__TOC__

WillFarrington is an Ubuntu and OSS software advocate. He is a member of the Ubuntuforums Beginners Team - a group of Ubuntu members committed to making the transition easier for new Linux and Ubuntu users. He is also a moderator on the Compiz forum, a member of the Compiz Community team, and aids significantly in writing and keeping up-to-date the Compiz Documentation.
